Result.Title: The unmaking of citizenship education for adult immigrants in Canada

Result.Abstract: Listeners are highly sensitive to divergences from native-speaker patterns of speech production, such that they can recognize second-language speakers even from very short stretches of speech. Result.Title: Detection of nonnative speaker status from content-masked speech
